text.autoconfig.external-text-edit.title: External Text Edit Config
text.autoconfig.external-text-edit.optio: Command to start the external editor

{file}: replaced with the path to the temporary file used for editing
{line}: replaced with the number of the current line being edited
{line0}: same as {line} but starting from 0
{column}: replaced with the current cursor position
{column0}: same as {column} but starting from 0
